system.description:
You revive a Target that died from damage in the last Round, restoring it with 1 HP and giving it 1 Fatigue. This Spell does not regenerate missing body parts.

In addition, you can spend Mana with this Spell to heal a Target for d6 HP per Mana spent to do so.
